without written consent. Also, assigning copyright to SG Railways, LLC from
myself.

title: adding Square's Otto
message:
adding Square's Otto

RecipientIdeasList was heavily coupled to the RecipientIdeasActivity.
With the Otto Bus in place, the coupling is broken and we're one step
closer to having small, isolated, testable listeners.

title: Using @InjectExtra
message:
Using @InjectExtra

This makes the app better by more clearly conveying that extras
are a declared dependency of an activity without having to look
through the activity callbacks.
